abstract: BP’s partners in the joint venture TNK-BP filed an injunction in London court to block BP’s sweeping deal with Russia’s state-run Rosneft to exchange shares and jointly explore offshore in the far north.
snippet: BP’s partners in the joint venture TNK-BP filed an injunction in London court to block BP’s sweeping deal with Russia’s state-run Rosneft to exchange shares and jointly explore offshore in the far north.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW –- Ten months after the disaster in the Gulf of Mexico, BP seemed ready to start a new chapter in its corporate history and struck a sweeping deal with Russia’s state-run Rosneft to exchange shares and jointly explore offshore in the far north.

headline.main: Russian Investors Seek to Block BP-Rosneft Deal
